comments:
A NPE can occur in BundleHost.getResources if the BundleLoader returns null from BundleLoader.getResources.

java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.BundleHost.getResources(BundleHost.java:283)

This is preventing the OSGi TCK from passing.
This bug got introduced with the fix to Bug 168216.

Created an attachment (id=56920)
patch

Adds the proper null check.
